summary: This document is a communication regarding an expected wire transfer of $20,000,000. Richard Kahn from HBRK Associates Inc. requests confirmation via email once the transfer is received. The document emphasizes confidentiality and includes a disclaimer about legal and tax advice.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is requesting confirmation of a wire transfer expected to arrive soon.

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, New York 10022
